connector.description: Receive data from Kafka topics in batch on Azure Eventhubs combined with Azure Schema Registry and commit them manually through KafkaManualCommit or auto commit.

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-registry-source.topic
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.description: Comma separated list of Kafka topic names

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-registry-source.bootstrapServers
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.description: Comma separated list of Kafka Broker URLs

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-registry-source.securityProtocol
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.description: Protocol used to communicate with brokers. SASL_PLAINTEXT, PLAINTEXT, SASL_SSL and SSL are supported

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-registry-source.saslMechanism
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.description: The Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) Mechanism used.

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-registry-source.autoCommitEnable
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.description: If true, periodically commit to ZooKeeper the offset of messages already fetched by the consumer

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-registry-source.allowManualCommit
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.description: Whether to allow doing manual commits

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-registry-source.pollOnError
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.description: What to do if kafka threw an exception while polling for new messages. There are 5 enums and the value can be one of DISCARD, ERROR_HANDLER, RECONNECT, RETRY, STOP

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-registry-source.autoOffsetReset
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.description: What to do when there is no initial offset. There are 3 enums and the value can be one of latest, earliest, none

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-registry-source.consumerGroup
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.description: A string that uniquely identifies the group of consumers to which this source belongs Example: my-group-id

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-registry-source.deserializeHeaders
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.description: When enabled the Kamelet source will deserialize all message headers to String representation.

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-registry-source.valueDeserializer
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.description: Deserializer class for value that implements the Deserializer interface.

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-registry-source.specificAvroValueType
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.description: The Specific Type Avro will have to deal with Example: com.example.Order

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-registry-source.batchSize
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.description: The maximum number of records returned in a single call to poll()

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-registry-source.pollTimeout
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.description: The timeout used when polling the KafkaConsumer

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-registry-source.maxPollIntervalMs
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.description: The maximum delay between invocations of poll() when using consumer group management

camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.name: camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-registry-source.topicIsPattern
camel.kamelet.kafka-batch-azure-schema-r.description: Whether the topic is a pattern (regular expression). This can be used to subscribe to dynamic number of topics matching the pattern.
